body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

unused images does not get deleted

**What you expected to happen**:

unused images get deleted

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

- configure kubelet with these args: 

    ```
    --eviction-soft=memory.available<800Mi,nodefs.available<3Gi,imagefs.available<6Gi
    --eviction-soft-grace-period=memory.available=10m,nodefs.available=10m,imagefs.available=10m
    --eviction-max-pod-grace-period=-1
    --eviction-hard=memory.available<300Mi,nodefs.available<1Gi
    --eviction-pressure-transition-period=10m
    ```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

when using above config, the node's events history showing:

```
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    Starting    Starting kubelet.
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Warning   ImageGCFailed   unable to find data for container /
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeHasSufficientDisk Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeHasSufficientDisk
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeHasSufficientMemory Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeHasSufficientMemory
3m    3m    2 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeHasNoDiskPressure Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeHasNoDiskPressure
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeNotReady    Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeNotReady
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeHasDiskPressure Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeHasDiskPressure
3m    3m    1 kubelet, 192.168.1.159      Normal    NodeReady   Node 192.168.1.159 status is now: NodeReady
```

If I change `--eviction-soft` to `--eviction-hard` ，it works, node's events history showing these:

```
46m   46m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    Starting    Starting kubelet.
46m   46m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeReady   Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeReady
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    Starting    Starting kubelet.
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Warning   ImageGCFailed   unable to find data for container /
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeHasSufficientDisk Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeHasSufficientDisk
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeHasSufficientMemory Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeHasSufficientMemory
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeNotReady    Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeNotReady
45m   45m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeReady   Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeReady
44m   44m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Warning   EvictionThresholdMet  Attempting to reclaim imagefs
44m   44m   1 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeHasDiskPressure Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeHasDiskPressure
45m   34m   2 kubelet, 192.168.1.158      Normal    NodeHasNoDiskPressure Node 192.168.1.158 status is now: NodeHasNoDiskPressure
```

The difference is there is an extra `EvictionThresholdMet` event, which is not seen with `--eviction-soft` cofnig.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):

        Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.4", GitCommit:"d6f433224538d4f9ca2f7ae19b252e6fcb66a3ae", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-05-19T18:44:27Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
        Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.4", GitCommit:"d6f433224538d4f9ca2f7ae19b252e6fcb66a3ae", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-05-19T18:33:17Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): ubuntu 16.04
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): Linux 192-168-1-1 4.4.0-63-generic #84-Ubuntu SMP Wed Feb 1 17:20:32 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
- Install tools: kubeadm

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: kubelet 1.6.4 not deleting unused images when eviction-soft imagefs threshold met
